title: Raspberry Pi 5 Model 8GB RAM
description: Greetings, Raspberry Pi enthusiasts! It’s official—the Raspberry Pi 5 has arrived Welcome to the cutting-edge Raspberry Pi 5 Model 8GB RAM, the latest generation of this iconic computing marvel. Packed with a 64-bit quad-core Arm Cortex-A76 processor clocked at 2.4GHz, the Raspberry Pi 5 boasts an impressive 2–3× increase in CPU performance compared to its predecessor, the Raspberry Pi 4.

reviews.name: Aditya
reviews.text: Good But stopped working after 3 days

title: Raspberry PI RP2040 Microcontroller IC REEL of 100
description: RP2040 Microcontroller IC by Raspberry PI-REEL of 100 It brings our signature values of high performance, low cost, and ease of use to the microcontroller space. With a large on-chip memory, symmetric dual-core processor complex, deterministic bus fabric, and rich peripheral set augmented with our unique Programmable I/O (PIO) subsystem, it provides professional users with unrivaled power and flexibility.

title: Mastech MS830N / MS830L+(2000 Counts) Manual Ranging Digital Multimeter
description: Mastech MS830N / MS830L+(2000 Counts) Manual Ranging Digital Multimeter is featuring a 2000-count display, the Mastech MS830N ensures precise and clear readings for essential electrical measurements, including voltage, current, and resistance. The manual-ranging capability allows users to manually select the appropriate measurement range, offering flexibility and control over the testing process.

title: LM2596S DC-DC Buck Converter Power Supply
description: DC-DC Buck Converter Step Down Module LM2596 Power Supply is a step-down(buck) switching regulator, capable of driving a 3-A load with excellent line and load regulation. These devices are available in fixed output voltages of 3.3 V, 5 V, 12 V, and an adjustable output version.The LM2596 series operates at a switching frequency of 150kHz, thus allowing smaller sized filter components than what would be required with lower frequency switching regulators.

title: LM2596S DC-DC Buck Converter Power Supply
description: 8 Pin IC Socket base adaptor is an 8 pin IC holder, which can be soldered directly onto the PCB. The IC can be removed from this socket when required. The IC is placed on the socket at the time of use. This base acts as a removable IC holder.The socket is used when the IC is temperature sensitive and the heat from the soldering iron can damage the IC. This socket is used when working with a microcontroller IC and can be removed for programming.

title: Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W
description: As u know the Raspberry Pi Zero W has been well performed and done its trade to enhance this the Raspberry has launched the brand new Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W which is the newest version to prior. Day by Day raspberry pi has reduced its dimensions with flawless technology into it this time the RPI Zero 2 W comes with a size of only 65mm long by 30mm wide and at a very economical price. With the addition of wireless LAN and Bluetooth, the Raspberry Pi Zero W2 is ideal for making embedded Internet of Things (IoT) projects. The Pi Zero W2 has been designed to be as flexible and compact as possible with mini connectors and an unpopulated 40-pin GPIO, allowing you to use only what your project requires.

title: Raspberry Pi 4 Model B with 4GB RAM
description: Raspberry Pi 4 Model B with 4GB RAM is the latest product in the popular Raspberry Pi range of computers. It offers ground-breaking increases in processor speed, multimedia performance, memory; and connectivity compared to the prior-generation Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ while retaining backward compatibility and similar power consumption. For the end-user, Raspberry Pi 4 Model B provides desktop performance comparable to entry-level x86 PC systems.

title: 1.5F – 5.5V – Super Capacitor
description: Super capacitors are perfect for applications where the capacity of a standard electrolytic capacitor is too small and a rechargeable battery is bigger than needed. This 1.5F capacitor will run an LED / Arduino board for 15-20mins

title: 1.5F – 6V – Super Capacitor
description: Super capacitors are perfect for applications where the capacity of a standard electrolytic capacitor is too small and a rechargeable battery is bigger than needed. The 1.5 Farad, 6 Volt Super Capacitor is a high-performance energy storage component designed to bridge the gap between traditional electrolytic capacitors and rechargeable batteries. Built for applications requiring rapid charge and discharge cycles, this super capacitor delivers reliable short-term power with exceptional efficiency and durability.

title: Teensy 4.1 Development Board
description: Here’s Teensy 4.1 Development Board. The Teensy 4.1 is the newest iteration of the astoundingly popular development platform that features an ARM Cortex-M7 processor at 600MHz, with an NXP iMXRT1062 chip, four times larger flash memory than the 4.0, and two new locations to optionally add more memory. The Teensy 4.1 is the same size and shape as the Teensy 3.6 (2.4in by 0.7in) and provides greater I/O capability, including an ethernet PHY, SD card socket, and USB host port.

title: Cytron 40 pins PIC Start Up Kit SK40C
description: This is Cytron 40 pins PIC Start Up Kit SK40C. The SK40C (new version of SK40B) is a 40pin PIC microcontroller starter kit designed to offer an easy-to-start solution for PIC microcontroller user. This board comes with the basic element for the user to begin project development. It offers plug and use features.

title: 40 Pins dsPIC Start Up Kit – SKDS40A
description: This is 40 Pins dsPIC Start Up Kit – SKDS40A. The SKds40A is designed to support Microchip  40-pin dsPIC MCU. It supports dsPIC30F3011, 4011, 3014, 4013.

title: CIKU PIC PIC18F4550 based Arduino form factor starter kit
description: This is 40 Pins dsPIC Start Up Kit – SKDS40A. The SKds40A is designed to support Microchip  40-pin dsPIC MCU. It supports dsPIC30F3011, 4011, 3014, 4013.

title: 650nm 6mm 5V DC 5mW Mini Laser Dot Diode Module
description: 650nm 6mm 5V DC 5mW Mini Laser Dot Diode Module which is made of copper plastic. It is suitable for 3V 5mW standard, with 6mm outside diameter, can be used to connect diode tubes for multiple uses.

title: Laser Module 650NM 5V
description: The LASER MODULE 650NM 5V head is composed of a light-emitting tube, condenser lens, and adjustable copper sleeve and it is assembled when delivered, the focal length of the lens is adjusted glued by strong glue stick, which can work directly after connecting to a 5V DC power supply.

title: Teensy 4.0 Development Board with Headers
description: The Teensy 4.0 with Headers is a compact yet incredibly powerful development board featuring a 600MHz ARM Cortex-M7 processor. Pre-soldered headers mean no hassle—just plug in and start building. Despite its tiny 1.4″ x 0.7″ footprint, this board delivers serious performance for real-time computing, audio, and high-speed interfaces.

title: Waveshare Luckfox Pico Mini A RV1103 Linux Micro Development Board, Integrates ARM Cortex-A7/RISC-V MCU/NPU/ISP Processors
description: The integration of diverse processors, including the ARM Cortex-A7, RISC-V MCU, NPU, and ISP, makes this board versatile for a range of applications requiring varied computational capabilities. Developers can leverage these components to build solutions that involve machine learning, image processing, IoT, and other embedded applications.

title: Logitech C270 Digital HD Webcam
description: The Logitech C270 Digital HD Webcam has Crisp HD 720p/30 fps video calls with diagonal 55° field of  view and auto light correction. This Logitech C270 Digital HD Webcam is Compatible with popular platforms including Skype and Zoom. The Logitech C270 Digital HD Webcam is  built-in noise-reducing mic makes sure your voice comes across clearly up to 1.5 meters away, even if you’re in busy surroundings. C270’s Right Light 2 feature adjusts to lighting conditions, producing brighter, contrasted images to help you look good in all your conference calls.

title: Elecrow CrowView Note-All-in-One Portable Monitor, Phone-to-Laptop Device With Full-Featured Type-C
description: we designed the Elecrow CrowView Note-All-in-One Portable Monitor , empowering all your devices as laptops. This Elecrow CrowView Note all-in-one portable monitor is compatible with smartphones, single-board computers such as Raspberry Pi 5 and Jetson Nano, mini PCs, and gaming consoles. It provides a clean, organized workspace, enhancing your productivity anywhere.

title: Olimex Duinomite-Mini PIC32MX795 PIC 32Bit
description: The Olimex Duinomite-mini Pic32MX795 Pic 32Bit is a Maximite Compatible Basic computer, originally designed by Geoff Graham, with additional features. DuinoMite allows you to program in BASIC language and have VGA and Keyboard interface, so you can develop and write your code in Basic without the need of any computer.

title: STMICROELECTRONICS NUCLEO-G071RB Development Board ,Nucleo-64, 32-Bit, STM32G071RB MCU
description: The STM Nucleo Development Board, STMICROELECTRONICS NUCLEO-G071RB – STM32 Nucleo-64 STM32G071RB Development Board boards provide an affordable and flexible way for users to try out new concepts and build prototypes with the STM32 microcontroller, which provide various combinations of performance, power consumption and features. do not require any separate probe, as it integrates the ST-LINK/V2-1 debugger/programmer. The STM32 Nucleo-64 boards come with the comprehensive free STM32 software libraries and examples that are available with the STM32Cube package.

title: 3.5″ inch ILI9486 TFT LCD Module 480×320 for Arduino Uno without Stylus
description: 3.5″ inch ILI9486 TFT  LCD Module 480×320 for Arduino Uno without Stylus is a compact yet powerful display solution designed specifically for Arduino Uno boards. With a high-resolution 480×320 screen, it offers crisp and clear visuals for your projects. This module boasts compatibility with Arduino Uno, making it easy to integrate into your existing projects. Whether you’re building a smart home dashboard, a portable gaming device, or an interactive art installation, this LCD Module provides a vibrant canvas for your creativity.

title: 4D Systems 3.2″ LCD module with Arduino Adaptor Shield and Cable uLCD-32PTU-AR
description: The 4D Arduino Adaptor Shield (Rev 2.0) is designed to seamlessly connect 4D Systems display modules to Arduino boards, eliminating the need for jumper wires. Compatible with gen4 displays like the gen4-uLCD-24DT and gen4-uLCD-43DT, it facilitates easy integration into projects. The included 4DLCD-32QA is a 3.2” TFT display with a resolution of 240×320 pixels, offering 65K colors, a brightness of 200 cd/m², and a contrast ratio of 350:1. With a 4-wire resistive touch screen and a 40-pin FPC interface, LCD module with Arduino Adapter Shield is perfect for enhancing Arduino projects that require a graphical display.

title: Micro USB-A to Micro-B Cable 100cm Data & Power Cable
description: The Micro USB-A to Micro-B Cable is a durable and reliable data and charging cable designed for a wide range of electronic devices. With a length of 100cm, it offers flexibility and convenience for connecting devices at a comfortable distance. The cable supports both data transfer and power delivery, making it suitable for smartphones, tablets, development boards, cameras, and other USB-enabled devices.

title: Official Arduino Edge Control AKX00034
description: The Official Arduino Edge Control can be positioned anywhere and is suitable for precision farming, smart agriculture, and other applications requiring intelligent control in remote locations. Power can be either supplied via solar panel or DC input.

title: SmartElex 16-Channel Analog/Digital MUX Breakout Board – CD74HC4067 (Pack of 2)
description: The SmartElex Analog/Digital MUX Breakout is a compact and smart board that brings huge flexibility to your circuits. With this Analog/Digital MUX Breakout, you can switch one signal line among 16 different channels - perfect when you want to read many sensors without using lots of pins. Built around the reliable CD74HC4067 chip, this 16-Channel MUX Breakout makes your work easier: whether you're dealing with analog signals like temperature sensors or digital signals like buttons and switches, it handles both. With just a few control lines, you can pick which channel to connect. Ideal for hobbyists, makers, and DIY electronics enthusiasts, this multiplexer module gives you room to expand without complexity. Simply plug it in, connect a few wires, and free up your microcontroller’s pins for other tasks - making your project cleaner and smarter.

title: ATSAMA5D27-SOM1
description: The module is built around the ATSAMA5D27C-D1G-CU, which is a 'System in Package' (SiP) that combines the microprocessor with DDR2 memory.

title: OSD3358-512M-ISM
description: The OSD3358-512M-ISM is a high-performance System-in-Package (SiP) from Octavo Systems. It is a more powerful alternative to the SAMA5D27-SOM1 you previously looked at, integrating a full Linux-ready computer—including the processor, RAM, and power management—into a single BGA package.

title: 40 pins PIC Start Up Kit Combo 2 SK40C + PIC18F4550 (SK40C2)
description: This is 40 pins PIC Start Up Kit Combo 2 SK40C + PIC18F4550 (SK40C2). The SK40C (new version of SK40B) is a 40pin PIC microcontroller starter kit designed to offer an easy-to-start solution for PIC microcontroller user. This board comes with the basic element for the user to begin project development. It offers plug and use features.

title: Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ Starter Kit
description: An exclusive Starter Kit from Robu.in that includes the fastest model of the Raspberry Pi family – The Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ and everything you need to get up and running.The raspberry pi 3 b+ kit is the most popular board featuring a 64-bit quad-core processor running at 1.4 GHz. It incorporates enhanced built-in dual-band WiFi (2.4 GHz and 5 GHz), Bluetooth 4.2/BLE, and faster Ethernet. Also included in this Raspberry Pi 3 Starter Kit is a premium Raspberry Pi 3 case, a 32 GB Class 10 MicroSD Card.The 5V,3 A Micro USB power supply is specially designed and tested for the Raspberry Pi 3 B+. The high-Quality 50cm HDMI to HDMI cable made up of Copper will give seamless connectivity with the Display. RJ45 Ethernet patch LAN cable with gold-plated connectors will give a high-speed LAN connection to your Board Get it and kick start your journey with Raspberry Pi.

title: Quantum Tiny Linux Development Kit – With SoM and Expansion Board
description: Quantum Tiny Linux Development Kit – With SoM and Expansion BoardQuantum Tiny Linux Development Kit consists of a core board which is the SoM (System on Module) and an expansion board as the carrier board.The SoM, Quark-N, is based on Allwinner H3, Quad-core Cortex-A7, and ARM Mali400 MP2 GPU. The carrier board, Atom-N, leads out a row of golden finger pins to realize I/O expansion, expand SPI, I2C, UART, GPIO, and other useful interfaces.The kit may be the smallest Linux development board on the market which is suitable for scenarios such as a personal server, intelligent voice assistant, and robotic development.

title: EK-TM4C123GXL
description: The EK-TM4C123GXL, also known as the Tiva C Series LaunchPad, is a low-cost evaluation platform from Texas Instruments for the ARM Cortex-M4F-based microcontroller. It is widely used in engineering education and for prototyping high-performance embedded systems.

title: X-NUCLEO-GNSS1A1
description: The X-NUCLEO-GNSS1A1 is a specialized expansion board from STMicroelectronics designed to add high-performance satellite positioning capabilities to STM32 Nucleo development boards. It is built around the Teseo-LIV3F tiny GNSS module.

title: SmartElex ATmega2560 Development Board with LCD1602 LCD Display-Upgraded
description: SmartElex ATMEGA2560 Development Board is a powerful development platform based on ATMEGA2560 microcontroller which is one of the most feature-rich AVR microcontrollers from Atmel, featuring 256K Flash, 8K RAM, 86 I/O lines arranged in nine 8 bit ports, 16 ADCs, 4 UARTs, 6 timers, 8 interrupts and much more. This board is ideal for developing embedded applications involving high-speed wireless communication, USB-based data logging, real-time data monitoring, and control etc.

title: ESP-01 ESP8266 Serial WIFI Wireless Transceiver Module
description: The ESP-01 ESP8266 Serial WIFI Wireless Transceiver Module is a self-contained SOC with integrated TCP/IP protocol stack that can give any microcontroller access to your WiFi network. The ESP8266 is capable of either hosting an application or offloading all Wi-Fi networking functions from another application processor.

title: ESPresso Lite V2.0 ESP8266, Espressif, IoT, wifi
description: The ESPresso Lite V2.0 ESP8266 is the first low-cost Arduino-compatible ESP8266 WiFi development board manufactured by Malaysia. Working together with experts, a Singapore IoT technology company, this board allows anyone to learn, experiment and build their IoT projects easily and quickly.

title: ESPresso Lite V2.0 IoT Starter Kit ESP8266, Espressif IoT WiFi
description: The ESPresso Lite V2.0 IoT Starter Kit is an all-in-one educational bundle designed for beginners and developers to quickly prototype connected devices. Unlike the standalone board, the Starter Kit specifically includes the necessary sensors and debugging tools to build a functional IoT node out of the box.

title: Micro SD Card Reader Module
description: Add the desired memory to your Arduino project to store the data, Media etc. Micro SD Card Reader Module also called Micro SD Adaptor which is designed for dual I/O voltages. The Module is a simple solution for transferring data to and from a standard SD card. The pinout is directly compatible with Not only with Arduino as shown in the diagram in below, but can also be used with other microcontrollers. Micro SD Card Reader Module has an SPI interface which is compatible with any sd card and it uses 5V or 3.3V power supply which is compatible with Arduino UNO/Mega.SD module has various applications such as data logger, audio, video, graphics.

title: MCU-Micro USB Breadboard 5V Power Supply Module
description: MCU-Micro USB Breadboard 5V Power Supply Module 5Pin Female Connector B type PCB Converter. This breakout board is great for interfacing USB Signals with your custom designed microcontroller boards. It also is useful if all you want is access to 5V USB power for your prototype circuits such as breadboards, perforated boards or Vero boards.Pinouts:VCC: 5V Power SupplyD- : USB D- SignalD+: USB D+ SignalID: USB Identifier Signal for OTG DevicesGND: Power Ground

title: Male to Female Jumper Wires 40 Pin 30cm
description: This is Male to Female Jumper Wires 40 Pin 30cm. A very Flexible and easily detachable cable to the no. of wires according to your requirement. It has 1Pin male to the 1pin female header with both ends. Also, it is compatible with 2.54 mm mil spacing pin headers.

title: ProMicro RP2040 Blackboard Proxy
description: The ProMicro RP2040 Blackboard Proxy is a high-performance, ultra-compact development board that adapts the powerful Raspberry Pi RP2040 chip into the classic "Pro Micro" footprint.

title: Microsoft’s Azure Sphere MT3620 Starter Kit
description: Microsoft’s Azure Sphere MT3620 Starter Kit supports rapid prototyping of highly secure, end-to-end IoT implementations using Microsoft’s Azure Sphere. The small form-factor carrier board includes a production-ready MT3620 Sphere module with Wi-Fi connectivity, along with multiple expansion interfaces for easy integration of sensors, displays, motors, relays, and more.This Starter Kit highlights Avnet’s certified, production-ready Sphere MT3620 module which is based on the highly integrated MediaTek MT3620AN tri-core Wi-Fi SoC device. Embedded user applications targeting it’s 500 MHz ARM Cortex-A7 application processor are built and debugged using Microsoft’s popular Visual Studio IDE.

title: Sipeed Maixduino for RISC-V AI + IoT
description: Based on MAIX Module, the Maixduino is a RISC-V 64 development board for AI + IoT applications. Different with other Sipeed MAIX dev. boards, Maixduino was designed in an Arduino Uno form factor, with the ESP32 module on board together with the MAIX AI module.

title: LILYGO T-Display 4MB ESP32 WiFi Bluetooth Development Board
description: This is LILYGO board is based on the ESP32-D0WDQ6 Wifi Module comes with a built-in 1.14inch display and also it has an onboard battery connector and battery management system. The board has an onboard USB Type – C connector which can be used to provide power and to upload code to the ESP32.Features:Easy to UseLOW Energy ConsumptionWide ApplicationLong Life

title: Pycom WiPy 2.0 WiFi-Bluetooth IOT Development Board
description: Introducing WiPy 2.0. The tiny MicroPython enabled Wifi & Bluetooth IoT development platform. With a 1KM WiFi range, state of the art Espressif ESP32 chipset and dual processor, the WiPy is all about taking the Internet of Things to the next level. Create and connect your things everywhere.

title: NANO32 ESP32 IoT Development Board
description: The NANO32 ESP32 IoT Development Board is the product by the designers of Arduino Nano and Espresso Lite (Thailand-based Gravitech and MakerAsia respectively) is the first third-party development board that provides another alternative to the eager-beavers community of geeks, makers, hackers and developers interested in the latest Wi-Fi/BT combo ‘wonder’ chip.

title: ESP8266 Serial Port To Wi-Fi Module, FL-M1S
description: This ESP8266 Serial Port To Wi-Fi Module, FL-M1S  serial transceiver module, based on ESP8266 SoC with an integrated TCP/IP protocol stack It can either host the application or offload all Wi-Fi networking functions from another application processor.ESP8266 has powerful onboard processing and storage capabilities allowing it to integrate with sensors and other devices through GPIOs with minimal development up-front and minimal loading during runtime.

title: Uno R3 Board without Cable compatible with Arduino
description: Uno R3 is one of the widely used and accepted module for prototyping. It has huge user community worldwide. Uno R3 SMD module is based on the Atmega328p-AU MCU of Atmel AVR Family. It is a 8 Bit Microcontroller. This is an entry level development board. But, is not a basic one, it packs 32 KB Flash, 2 KB RAM, and 1 KB of EEPROM.

title: Data Logger module Logging Shield data Recorder Shield
description: Here’s a handy Arduino shield we’ve had a lot of people looking for a dedicated and well-designed data logging shield. We worked hard to engineer an inexpensive but well-rounded design. Not only is it easy to assemble and customize. The Data Logger module Logging Shield data Recorder Shield also comes with great documentation and libraries.

title: UNO Proto Shield prototype expansion board with SYB-170 mini breadboard
description: Used in conjunction with the Arduino UNO Proto Shield prototype expansion board, used to build prototype circuits can be directly soldered components on the board, you can also connect the circuit through the above mini breadboard. Between breadboard and the board through the double-sided adhesive connection, when sold breadboard and the board are separate.

title: Adafruit Industries LLC 2130
description: The Adafruit 2130, also known as the PowerBoost 1000C, is a highly versatile power management module. It is a combined DC/DC boost converter and LiPo battery charger that allows you to run a 5V project from a single-cell Lithium Ion or Lithium Polymer battery, even while the battery is being charged.

title: Renesas Electronics Fast Prototyping Board for RL78/G23 16 bit Prototyping Board RTK7RLG230CLG000BJ
description: This board is optimized for low-power applications and ease of use. It features the RL78/G23 16-bit MCU, which is known for its industry-leading low power consumption and high processing performance. The board includes a built-in emulator circuit, allowing you to write and debug programs without needing additional tools. It also provides Arduino Uno and Pmod™ interfaces, making it highly expandable with a wide range of existing sensors and modules.

title: Infineon OPTIGA Trust Adapter Adapter Evaluation Board OPTIGATRUSTADAPTERTOBO1
description: This adapter board acts as a standardized hardware interface for evaluating Infineon's OPTIGA™ Trust security solutions (such as the Trust M, Trust X, or Trust E). It allows you to easily connect these security chips to popular development ecosystems like Arduino, Raspberry Pi, and MikroE Click sockets. It is a critical tool for developers looking to add hardware-based security, such as authentication, encryption, and secure storage, to their IoT devices without designing custom PCBs in the early stages.

title: Microchip AVR16EB32 CURIOSITY NANO PCB Assembly Evaluation Board EV73J36A
description: This PCB assembly features the AVR16EB32 microcontroller, which is an 8-bit MCU optimized for low-latency control and analog signal conditioning. The board includes an on-board debugger (nEDBG), which means no external tools are required to program or debug the MCU. It provides access to all I/O pins via headers and includes a user-programmable button and LED. The board is also compatible with the Curiosity Nano Base for Click boards™, allowing for easy hardware expansion.

title: NodeMcu V3 Lua WIFI Internet of Things development board
description: The NodeMCU V3 (often manufactured by LoLin) integrates the ESP-12E module with a built-in USB-to-Serial converter (typically the CH340G) and a 3.3V voltage regulator. This "all-in-one" design allows you to plug it directly into your computer via Micro-USB to start programming. While it was originally designed for the Lua scripting language, it is most commonly programmed today using Arduino C++ or MicroPython.

title: ESP32 Nodemcu Lua Board Development
description: The ESP32 NodeMCU is a powerful upgrade to the ESP8266, featuring a dual-core 32-bit processor, integrated Wi-Fi, and Dual-mode Bluetooth (Classic + BLE). It is designed for high-performance IoT applications that require more processing power and memory. While "NodeMCU" refers to the original Lua firmware, these boards are now industry standards for MicroPython and Arduino development. They include an onboard USB-to-Serial bridge (like the CP2102 or CH340) and a voltage regulator for easy USB-powered prototyping.

title: PCIe to M.2 4G/5G And USB 3.2 HAT for Raspberry Pi 5
description: The PCIe to M.2 4G/5G and USB 3.2 HAT is an add-on board that converts the Raspberry Pi 5's 16-pin PCIe connector into an M.2 Key-B slot (typically used for 4G/5G modules) and additional USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports. These HATs often include integrated cooling, SIM card slots, and power management to handle the high power requirements of 5G modems. They allow the Pi 5 to act as a high-speed cellular gateway or an industrial IoT controller with ultra-low latency.

title: Micro HDMI to HDMI Multifunctional Adapter for Raspberry Pi
description: A specialized connector designed for the Raspberry Pi 4 and Raspberry Pi 5, which use Micro HDMI ports to save space. A "multifunctional" version often goes beyond a simple gender changer; it may include features like integrated audio breakout (3.5mm jack), additional power inputs to stabilize the signal over long cables, or a 90-degree angled design to fit into tight enclosures or "Blackboard" proxy setups. It allows you to use standard, full-sized HDMI cables to connect your Pi to monitors, TVs, or projectors.

title: USB Current and Voltage Meter - Voltmeter / Ammeter for USB Chargers
description: A compact, "pass-through" diagnostic tool used to measure the real-time voltage (Volts) and current draw (Amps) from a USB power source to a connected device. It is essential for testing the health of USB chargers, checking the quality of charging cables, and monitoring the power consumption of microcontrollers like the ESP32 or Raspberry Pi. Many models also track capacity (mAh) and energy (Wh), which is helpful for testing the actual capacity of power banks.

title: 16 Bit I2C ADS1115 4 channel ADC Module with Pro Gain Amplifier
description: A high-precision 16-bit Analog-to-Digital Converter (ADC) that allows microcontrollers without built-in ADCs (like the Raspberry Pi) or with low-resolution ADCs to read analog signals with extreme accuracy. It features four input channels that can be used as four single-ended or two differential inputs. The integrated Programmable Gain Amplifier (PGA) allows you to boost small signals up to $\pm 256\text{mV}$, making it ideal for measuring tiny voltage changes from sensors. It communicates via I2C, making it easy to chain with other modules.

title: AD8221AR / AD8221 Precision Instrumentation Amplifier
description: The AD8221 is a high-performance, precision instrumentation amplifier that delivers the industry's highest Common-Mode Rejection Ratio (CMRR) over frequency in its class. It is designed to extract small differential signals in the presence of large common-mode noise, making it ideal for precision data acquisition, biomedical monitoring, and aerospace instrumentation. The gain is easily set with a single external resistor, ranging from 1 to 1000. It is available in space-saving MSOP and SOIC packages, ensuring high accuracy even at high temperatures and frequencies.

title: 12 Bit I2C ADS1015 4 channel ADC Module with Pro Gain Amplifier
description: The ADS1015 is a high-speed, precision 12-bit Analog-to-Digital Converter (ADC) designed for microcontrollers that either lack an ADC or require higher performance. It features four input channels that can be configured as four single-ended or two differential inputs. Its standout feature is the Programmable Gain Amplifier (PGA), which can boost low-voltage signals (up to x16), allowing for the measurement of very small analog changes. With a high sampling rate of up to 3300 samples per second, it is significantly faster than its 16-bit sibling (the ADS1115), making it ideal for monitoring rapidly changing signals.

title: CJMCU-9833 AD9833 Module Signal Generator Module
description: A low-power, programmable waveform generator capable of producing sine, triangular, and square wave outputs. It is based on the AD9833 Direct Digital Synthesis (DDS) chip. The module features a high-precision 25MHz active crystal oscillator and communicates via a 3-wire SPI interface, making it easy to control frequency and phase via software. It is widely used for sensor excitation, frequency sweeping, and clock generation in electronic testing.

title: 10A 12V-40V 13KHz PWM DC Motor Adjuster
description: A high-efficiency Pulse Width Modulation (PWM) speed controller designed for DC motors. It allows you to control the speed of a motor by adjusting the duty cycle of the power delivered, rather than changing the voltage, which preserves torque even at low speeds. This specific module supports a wide input range of 12V to 40V and can handle up to 10A of continuous current. It features an onboard potentiometer for manual adjustment and typically includes a 10A fuse for overcurrent protection.

title: 90W 5A / 200W PWM Motor Speed Controller Module
description: A versatile Pulse Width Modulation (PWM) DC motor speed controller designed to regulate motor speed with high efficiency and minimal heat. These modules typically feature an onboard potentiometer for manual control and an integrated fuse for overcurrent protection. The 90W/5A version is ideal for smaller 12V-24V applications, while the 200W (up to 10A) variant is suited for more demanding 12V-36V projects. Unlike simple voltage regulators, these maintain motor torque even at lower speeds by rapidly switching the power on and off (duty cycle adjustment).

title: XM1584 Ultra-Small Size DC-DC Step Down Module
description: An ultra-compact buck (step-down) converter designed for applications with extremely limited space. It is based on the XM1584 (or sometimes the MP2307) high-frequency switching regulator. This module is significantly smaller than the common LM2596 boards, yet it can efficiently step down higher input voltages to a lower, stable output voltage. It features an onboard multi-turn potentiometer for precise output voltage adjustment.

title: VXO78015-500-M-TR
description: A high-efficiency non-isolated DC-DC switching regulator designed as a pin-compatible, high-performance replacement for traditional LM78xx linear regulators. Part of the VXO78 series from CUI Inc., this surface-mount (SMT) module provides a fixed 1.5V output at up to 500mA. Unlike linear regulators, it does not require a heatsink because it uses switching technology to minimize power dissipation, making it ideal for compact, battery-powered designs

title: V7812-500
description: A high-efficiency switching regulator designed to be a high-performance, drop-in replacement for the classic LM7812 linear regulator. While the traditional LM7812 dissipates excess voltage as heat (often requiring a bulky heatsink), the V7812-500 uses switching technology to achieve up to 95% efficiency. This allows it to convert a wide range of input voltages down to a stable 12V output at 500mA without getting hot, making it perfect for compact or battery-operated devices where thermal management is a concern.

title: ULP40-1348 (EOS Power)
description: A high-efficiency, ultra-low profile AC-DC open-frame power supply. It is designed to deliver 40W of power in a compact 2x3 inch footprint, specifically for applications where space is at a premium and high reliability is required. The ULP (Ultra-Low Profile) series is known for its high power density and ability to operate with convection cooling. This specific model provides a stable 48V DC output, making it suitable for industrial automation, telecommunications, and PoE (Power over Ethernet) injectors.

title: SmartElex MAX31856 Temperature PCB Breakout Board with SPI Interface
description: A high-precision digital temperature sensor expansion board based on the MAX31856 IC. This module is designed to handle all types of thermocouples (K, J, N, R, S, T, E, and B) and provides cold-junction compensation and digitization. Unlike simpler modules, it features high-precision 19-bit resolution and internal protection against overvoltage and shorts to ground or VCC. It communicates via a high-speed SPI interface, making it compatible with any microcontroller that needs to measure extreme temperatures (up to $+1800^\circ\text{C}$).

title: SmartElex NEO-M9N GNSS Breakout Board
description: A high-performance Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) receiver board based on the advanced u-blox M9 platform. This module can concurrently receive signals from up to four GNSS constellations (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, and BeiDou), significantly increasing positioning accuracy and reducing lock time in challenging environments. It features a high update rate of up to 25 Hz, an integrated SMA connector for external antennas, and an onboard battery for hot-start capabilities.

title: SmartElex 3.3V 1A LM2575S Buck Module
description: A high-efficiency DC-DC Step-Down (Buck) converter module designed to provide a stable 3.3V output from a higher input voltage. It is based on the LM2575S-3.3 monolithic integrated circuit, which is known for its reliability and simplicity compared to older linear regulators. This module is capable of driving a 1A load with excellent line and load regulation. It typically features integrated filter capacitors to ensure a low-ripple output, making it safe for powering sensitive digital electronics.

title: 2-String 20A Lithium Battery Protection Module Balanced Version
description: A high-performance BMS (Battery Management System) designed for a 2-cell (2S) Lithium-ion or Lithium-Polymer battery pack. This "Balanced Version" ensures that both cells in the series are charged to the same voltage level, significantly extending battery life and improving safety. It provides comprehensive protection against overcharge, over-discharge, over-current, and short circuits. With a 20A continuous discharge rating, it is powerful enough for motor-driven projects, power tools, and high-current IoT gateways.

title: DFRobot MP2636 Power Booster & Charger Module
description: A high-performance, all-in-one power management module designed for portable electronics. It integrates a Lithium battery charger and a DC-DC boost converter on a single board. Based on the MP2636 highly integrated flexible switch-mode device, it supports charging a single-cell Li-ion/Li-poly battery and boosting its voltage to a stable 5V output. It features a unique bi-directional design, allowing it to act as both a charger (via Micro-USB) and a power supply (via USB-A), making it the perfect core for DIY power banks or mobile robots.

title: TP4056 1A Li-Ion Battery Charging & Protection Module
description: This is the most popular, low-cost module for charging single-cell 3.7V Lithium-ion (Li-ion) or Lithium-Polymer (LiPo) batteries. This specific version includes a dual-protection circuit (using the DW01A and 8205A chips), which protects the battery from over-charging, over-discharging, and over-current. It is powered via a Micro USB port or external solder pads, making it ideal for converting wired devices into rechargeable ones.

title: 3.7V 2500mAh 18650 Li-Ion Battery
description: The 18650 is a standardized cylindrical lithium-ion cell (18mm diameter, 65mm length) widely used in everything from laptop batteries to electric vehicles. A 2500mAh capacity at a nominal 3.7V provides approximately 9.25Wh of energy. These cells are favored for DIY projects because of their high energy density, rechargeable nature, and compatibility with numerous holders and management modules.

title: SW3518 100W High-Power Fast Charging Module
description: The SW3518 is a highly integrated, multi-protocol DC-DC Step-Down (Buck) converter module. It is engineered for high-performance power delivery, making it one of the few hobbyist-accessible modules capable of a true 100W output via USB-C. Because it supports PPS (Programmable Power Supply) and nearly every major fast-charging standard, it is a favorite for building custom bench power supplies, automotive chargers, or high-capacity portable power banks.

title: 1 lithium battery pack 5V charge and discharge board
description: These boards are designed to allow "pass-through" charging, meaning you can power your project while the battery is charging. When the external power is removed, the board instantly switches to battery power, acting as a Mini-UPS. They are commonly used to make portable versions of microcontrollers that require 5V, such as an Arduino Uno or a Raspberry Pi.

title: STMICROELECTRONICS Development Board, Nucleo, STM32 MCUS, Arduino Uno Compatible, On-Board Programmer
description: The Nucleo-64 board features an STM32 microcontroller in a LQFP64 package. It is divided into two main sections: the integrated ST-LINK debugger/programmer (the top part that can be snapped off) and the target microcontroller (the main board). It supports a wide range of Integrated Development Environments (IDEs), including IAR, Keil, and GCC-based IDEs (like STM32CubeIDE), and is fully compatible with the Arduino ecosystem.

title: STM32F411CEU6 Minimum System Board Microcomputer STM32 ARM Core Board
description: This is a Minimum System Board, meaning it contains only the essential components to run the microcontroller: the MCU itself, a crystal oscillator (typically 25MHz), a reset button, a user button, and a USB-C connector for power and communication. It is designed to be breadboard-friendly and is widely used for high-end embedded projects, including audio processing, motor control, and complex sensor fusion.

title: Adafruit Feather M0 Express – Designed for CircuitPython -ATSAMD21 Cortex-M0
description: The Feather M0 Express is the "all-around" board for modern embedded development. Unlike the standard Feather M0, the Express version features a 2 MB SPI Flash chip which acts as a tiny hard drive. When you plug it into your computer, it shows up as a USB drive (CIRCUITPY), allowing you to drag and drop your Python files directly onto the board without needing a dedicated programmer or compiler.

title: NXP Development Kit KWIKSTIK-K40 K40X256VLQ100 MCU, USB Touch Sensing and Segment LCD Functionality
description: The KwikStik is unique because of its form factor: it is a sleek, handheld board that functions as a standalone development platform or can be plugged into a PC as a USB stick. It features an integrated debugger, a built-in segment LCD, and on-board touch-sensing pads, making it an "out-of-the-box" solution for prototyping medical devices, industrial controllers, or consumer electronics that require a display and touch interface

title: MIC4576-5BU IC – Step Down Regulator IC
description: The MIC4576-5BU simplifies the design of switching power supplies by requiring a minimum number of external components (only an inductor, a catch diode, and two capacitors). It operates at a fixed switching frequency of 200 kHz, which allows for smaller filter components than lower-frequency regulators. The "5BU" designation typically refers to the 5.0V fixed output in a TO-263 (D2PAK) surface-mount package.

title: KA7805 Linear Voltage Regulator
description: The KA78xx series of the three-terminal positive regulator are available in the TO-220/D-PAK package and with several fixed output voltages, making them useful in a wide range of applications. Each type employs internal current limiting, thermal shut-down and safe operating area protection, making it essentially indestructible. If adequate heat sinking is provided, they can deliver over 1A output current. Although designed primarily as fixed voltage regulators, these devices can be used with external components to obtain adjustable voltages and currents.

title: Altera MAX II EPM240 CPLD Development Board
description: This board is a "minimum system" break-out for the EPM240T100C5N chip. It provides a massive amount of GPIOs for its size and is frequently used for high-speed glue logic, bus bridging, or as a learning platform for Verilog or VHDL hardware description languages. Because it is non-volatile, the configuration is stored on the chip itself, so it starts running your logic the microsecond power is applied.

title: ARIES MICRO v1.0 Devlopment Board
description: The ARIES MICRO is the smaller sibling of the ARIES v2.0 board. It utilizes the VEGA ET1031, a 32-bit RISC-V microcontroller core. The board is designed to be highly accessible for hobbyists and professionals alike, offering a rich set of peripherals in a breadboard-friendly package. It is specifically designed to reduce dependency on foreign silicon and build a local ecosystem for embedded systems.

title: SparkFun DEV-15423 Qwiic Micro – SAMD21 Development Board
description: Measuring only 1" x 0.5", the Qwiic Micro is designed for projects where space is at a premium. Despite its tiny footprint, it packs all the power of the SAMD21 architecture. It is essentially a "pro" version of a microcontroller board that eliminates the need for bulky headers or soldering when using SparkFun’s Qwiic-enabled peripherals. It comes pre-loaded with the UF2 bootloader, making it extremely easy to flash code.

title: SparkFun DEV-17745 Thing Plus – RP2040
description: This board features the RP2040—a dual-core ARM Cortex-M0+ processor—mounted on a board with the Feather-compatible pinout. This means it works with a vast ecosystem of "FeatherWing" add-on boards. Unlike the basic Pico, the Thing Plus includes several "pro" upgrades: a Qwiic connector for solderless I2C, a built-in LiPo battery charger, and 16MB of external Flash memory (8 times more than the standard Pico).

title: Sipeed M1 dock suit ( M1 dock + 2.4 inch LCD + OV2640 ) K210 Dev. Board for Edge Computing
description: The Sipeed M1 Dock Suit is a powerful entry-level kit for Edge AI and computer vision. At its core is the Kendryte K210, a dual-core 64-bit RISC-V processor equipped with a built-in Neural Network Processor (KPU). This allows the board to perform real-time image recognition, object detection, and audio processing directly on the "edge" without needing a cloud connection.

title: Digilent Arty Z7-10 Zynq-7000 SoC Development Board
description: he Arty family of Digilent FPGA/SoC boards was designed with versatility and flexibility in mind. With universally popular Arduino™ headers and multiple Pmod™ ports, an Arty will be the most adaptable FPGA/SoC board in your toolbox.The Digilent Arty Z7 is a ready-to-use development platform designed around the Xilinx Zynq®-7000 System-on-a-chip (SoC) family. The Zynq®-7000 SoC family integrates the software programmability of an ARM®-based processor with the hardware programmability of an FPGA, enabling key analytics and hardware acceleration while integrating CPU, DSP, ASSP, and mixed signal functionality on a single device.The Digilent Arty Z7 is supported by Xilinx’s Vivado Design Suite, including the free WebPACK version. The SDSoC™ Development Environment provides a familiar embedded C/C++/OpenCL application development experience for heterogeneous Zynq® SoC deployment.

title: TPA3116D2 Audio Amplifier with Tone Control Panel, 2 x 80 W (12 – 24 VDC or 12 – 17 VAC)
description: The TPA3116D2 Audio Amplifier with Tone Control Panel is a versatile audio device capable of delivering 2 x 80 watts of power. It operates on a wide voltage range, supporting 12-24 VDC or 12-17 VAC power sources. This amplifier features integrated tone control for fine-tuning audio output, making it suitable for various audio applications while offering robust and efficient performance.

title: MAX4466 Electret Microphone Amplifier with Adjustable Gain Module
description: MAX4466 Electret Microphone Amplifier with Adjustable Gain Module is fully assembled; tested board comes with a 20-20KHz electret microphone soldered on. For the amplification, we use the Maxim MAX4466, an op-amp specifically designed for this delicate task; The amplifier has excellent power supply noise rejection, so this amplifier sounds really good and isn’t nearly as noisy or scratchy as other mic amp breakouts we've tried!

title: RDA5807M (RRD-102 V2.0) FM Stereo Radio Module
description: RDA5807M FM Stereo Radio Module is (FM Stereo radio Module) high sensitivity, low power consumption, ultra-small size of the FM stereo radio module. Using RDA Microelectronics of RDA5807M(or RDA5802NM), this circuit fewer external components, the noise factor is minimal. Small size, low power consumption, low cost, simple application, the use of a wide range of advantages. It is an easy-to-use and possessed highly cost-effective single-chip FM stereo radio module.

title: Elecrow Pico W5 Microcontroller Development Board
description: The Elecrow Pico W5 is a powerful microcontroller development board built around the Raspberry Pi RP2040 chip, tailored for IoT and embedded applications. Featuring a 32-bit dual-core ARM Cortex-M0+ processor running at up to 133 MHz, it offers reliable performance for various tasks. This upgraded version surpasses the original Pico W with enhanced features such as dual-band WiFi (2.4 GHz/5 GHz), Bluetooth 5.0, a larger flash memory, and a USB Type-C interface.

title: CAPUF CH32V003 Development Kit with 0.96″ OLED Display
description: The CAPUF CH32V003 Development Kit is a comprehensive platform designed for developers and engineers to explore and utilize the capabilities of the CH32V003 microcontroller. Equipped with a 0.96-inch OLED display, this development kit offers an ideal environment for prototyping, testing, and developing embedded applications.

title: Unsoldered ATTINY88 Development Board 16Mhz Compatible NANO V3.0 Improvement Board
description: The ATtiny88 Nano V3.0 is a compatible and cheaper version of the Arduino Nano V3.0. This variant is based on the ATtiny88 Microcontroller chip. This board contains a Micro USB connection with which the ATtiny can be programmed and powered. Usually, Nano boards use a CH340 chip for converting USB to Serial, for example, but the ATtiny88 microcontroller has this built in.

title: Digispark ATTINY85 Mini USB Development Board
description: Although small in size, great in capabilities. The Digispark ATTINY85 Mini USB Development Board is similar to the Arduino but cheaper and smaller (of course a bit less powerful). With a whole host of shields to extend its functionality and the ability to use the familiar Arduino IDE, this board is a great way to jump into microcontroller electronics.

title: GL-12 840 Points Solderless Breadboard
description: Parts will not be damaged so they will be available for re-use afterward. 840 Tie points – 128 Groups of 5 connected terminals, 8 Bus of 25 connected terminals Reusable for fast build a prototype of an electronic circuit – will accept transistors, diodes, LEDs, resistors, capacitors and virtually all types of components – No soldering required – Can modify or revise the circuits easily Fit for jumper wire of 0.8mm diameter – Standard 2.54mm hole spacing Adhesive sheet on the back side of the board – Multiple breadboards can be spliced together too.

title: ATTINY85-20PU MICROCHIP 8 Bit MCU, AVR ATtiny Family ATtiny85 Series Microcontrollers, AVR, 20 MHz, 8 KB, 8 Pins, DIP
description: The high-performance, low-power 8bit AVR RISC-based microcontroller combines 8KB ISP flash memory, 512B EEPROM, 512-Byte SRAM, 6 general purpose I/O lines, 32 general purpose working registers, one 8bit timer/counter with compare modes, one 8bit high-speed timer/counter, USI, internal and external Interrupts, 4-channel 10-bit A/D converter, programmable watchdog timer with internal oscillator, three software selectable power saving modes, and debugWIRE for on-chip debugging. The device achieves a throughput of 20 MIPS at 20 MHz and operates between 2.7-5.5 volts.

title: ATTINY85 USB Development Board
description: The ATtiny85 based mini development board is similar to the Arduino, but cheaper and smaller (of course a bit less powerful). With a whole host of shields to extend its functionality and the ability to use the familiar Arduino IDE, this ATTINY85 USB Development Board is a great way to jump into microcontroller electronics.

title: NodeMCU ESP8266 Serial Port Baseboard
description: This is NodeMCU ESP8266 Serial Port Baseboard Lua WIFI Development Board.This baseboard is the Breakout Board for our NodeMcu ESP8266 V3 Lua CH340 Wifi Dev. Board. Nodemcu Baseboard NodeMcu Lua WIFI Development Board ESP8266 Serial Port Baseboard is an open-source networking platform.

title: SmartElex Aryabhatta 8051 Microcontroller Development Board AT89S52 with Onboard USB Programmer
description: This?8051 Development Board is aimed at providing the microcontroller newbies with a quick way into the development of embedded projects. The Aryabhatta 8051 Development Board AT89S52 with Onboard USB Programmer is very easy to use but also at the same time offering high functionality and yet it is available at a price everyone can afford!!!

title: PIC K150 USB Automatic Develop Microcontroller Programmer with ICSP Cable (Body width: 4 mm)
description: The PIC K150 USB Automatic Develop Microcontroller Programmer With ICSP Cable is a low-cost high-performance PIC programmer. This supports most popular PIC chips, programmed, readout, encryption, use a high-speed USB communication, fast programming.

title: zinky-zynq-7000-development-board-1000x1000
description: Local supply 5V on board for required functions and power delivery. Linux BSP with Root FS support. Free RTL support. Customized Carrier boards can be developed. Zynq is a Controller + FPGA best for configuration.

title: Industrial Shields Raspberry Pi PLC CPU Gateway
description: The Raspberry Pi PLC CPU Gateway is a high-performance modular industrial controller designed for automation, monitoring, and IoT applications. Combining fast processing, real-time multitasking, and advanced connectivity, it supports a wide range of projects—from smart infrastructure and energy management to water consumption control.

title: Industrial Shields Controllino MICRO Controller
description: The Controllino MICRO is a compact yet powerful industrial controller built around the 32-bit Raspberry Pi RP2040 microcontroller, fully compatible with the Arduino ecosystem. Designed for space-constrained automation and control applications, it delivers high performance in the smallest Controllino form factor to date.

title: SeeedStudio Grove Air Quality Sensor v1.3
description: SeeedStudio Grove Air quality sensor v1.3 is designed for indoor air quality testing. It can respond to carbon monoxide, alcohol, acetone, thinner, formaldehyde, and other slightly toxic gases. Compatible with 5V and 3.3V power supply, it can work with Arduino and Raspberry Pi. With its long-term stability & low power consumption, it would be a perfect choice for air quality monitoring.

title: INMP441 MEMS High Precision Omnidirectional Microphone Module I2S
description: The INMP441 is a high-performance, low-power, digital output, omnidirectional MEMS microphone with a bottom port. The complete INMP441 solution consists of a MEMS sensor, signal conditioning, analog to digital converter, anti-aliasing filter, power management, and industry-standard 24-bit I2S interface.

title: Microphone 9×7mm (Pack of 3)
description: This Voice microphone is Multi-Channel and is suitable for mobile phones, telephones, tape recorders, voice-activated toys, computers, and other products. The sensitivity is in accordance with the IEC standard, and the sensitivity of “pa” is increased by 20dB, which is the same as the sensitivity of the “Ubar” unit.

title: Seeed Studio Grove Sound Sensor
description: Need a sound sensing device with high sensitivity? We have the Grove – Sound Sensor especially for you. It detects the sound intensity of the environment. It is a simple microphone based on the LM386 amplifier and an electret microphone. The output of this module is analog so that you can easily sample and test it by a Seeeduino or an Arduino. The sensor also comes with a potentiometer, so you can adjust the value of output by varying it.

title: Voice Recognition Module V3 Compatible with Arduino
description: Speak (Voice) Recognition Module V3 product is a speaker-dependent voice recognition module. It supports up to 80 voice commands in all. Max 7 voice commands could work at the same time. Any sound could be trained as the command. Users need to train the module first before let it recognizing any voice command.

title: L298N 2A Based Motor Driver Module – Good Quality
description: It uses the popular L298 motor driver IC and has an onboard 5V regulator which it can supply to an external circuit. It can control up to 4 DC motors, or 2 DC motors with directional and speed control.This motor driver is perfect for robotics and mechatronics projects and perfect for controlling motors from microcontrollers, switches, relays, etc. Perfect for driving DC and Stepper motors for micro mouse, line following robots, robot arms, etc.

title: 1203B PWM 6V 12V 24V 28V 3A DC Motor Speed Regulator
description: This 1203B PWM 6V 12V 24V 28V 3A DC Motor Speed Regulator allows controlling the speed of a motor with fully adjustable 0%-100%. The motor speed controller can easily provide a continuous current of 3A to your DC motor or other DC load.

title: Brushless Motor Controller DC 12-36V 500W PWM Driver Board
description: This Brushless Motor Controller DC 12-36V 500W PWM Driver Board is used for the 3-phase brushless sensorless motor, but not suit for all 3-phase brushless sensorless motors directly. If the driving effect is not good (such as starting jitter, reversing, the motor no-load working current is too large, the speed is not stable, the efficiency is low, and can’t start up with a load) Customers can adjust the resistance and capacitance of the driver board according to the actual situation to achieve the best driving effect.

title: CCM5D Digital PWM DC Motor Speed Controller With Display
description: This CCM5D Digital PWM DC Motor Speed Controller With Display is used to control the speed of a DC motor through PWM. This controller comes with a 3 digit 7 segment Red color display, which displays the duty cycle of the PWM from range 0 to 100.

title: 12V 24V 36V 40A PWM DC Motor Speed Controller Forward Reverse Adjustable Knob Switch with Case
description: This is High Power 12V/24V/36V 40A PWM DC Reversible Motor Controller.  A motor controller is a device or group of devices that serves to govern in some predetermined manner the performance of an electric motor. A motor controller might include a manual or automatic means for starting and stopping the motor, selecting forward or reverse rotation, selecting and regulating the speed, regulating or limiting the torque, and protecting against overloads and faults.

title: HG7881 4-Channel DC 2.4-10V Motor Driver Broad
description: This HG7881 4-Channel dc motor driver module comes with its own four L9110S chip. It can drive 4 DC or Can drive two 4-wire 2-phase stepping motor.

title: Forward/Reverse Motor Controller Board 12V 24V Motor Two Relay Delay Timing Cycle YYB-5 Module
description: The Forward/Reverse Motor Controller Board 12V 24V Motor Two Relay Delay Timing Cycle YYB-5 Module is an electronic module designed to control the direction, speed, and timing of a DC motor.

title: Motor Driver TB6612FNG Module Performance Ultra Small Volume 3 PI Matching Performance Ultra L298N
description: The Motor Driver TB6612FNG Module motor driver can control up to two DC motors at a constant current of 1.2A (3.2A peak). Two input signals (IN1 and IN2) can be used to control the motor in one of four function modes – CW, CCW, short-brake, and stop.

title: Waveshare General Driver board for Robots, Based on ESP32
description: Waveshare General Driver board for Robots, Based on ESP32, multi-functional, supports WIFI, Bluetooth and ESP-NOW communications

title: SX1278 LoRa Module Ra- 02 433MHZ Wireless Spread Spectrum Transmission
description: Ra-02 is a wireless transmission module based on SEMTECH’s SX1278 wireless transceiver. It adopts advanced LoRa spread spectrum technology, with a communication distance of 10,000 meters. It has a strong ability of anti-jamming and has the function of air wake-up Consumption. The SX1278 RF module is mainly used for long-range spread spectrum communication, and it can resist Minimizing current consumption. The SX1278 has a high sensitivity of -148 dBm with a power output of +20 dBm, and a long transmission distance and high reliability. At the same time, compared with the traditional modulation technology, LoRa ™ modulation technology has obvious advantages in anti-blocking and selection, which solves the problem that the traditional design scheme can not consider the distance, interference and power consumption at the same time.

title: Wireless Transmitter 915Mhz, Lora Shield for Leonardo,, UNO, Mega2560,, Duemilanove, Due
description: Lora Shield is a long-range transceiver on the Arduino shield form factor and is based on an Open source library. The Lora Shield allows the user to send data and reach extremely long ranges at low data rates. It provides ultra-long range spread spectrum communication and high interference immunity whilst minimising current consumption.

title: NANO IO Shield Expansion Board For Arduino Screw Terminals
description: NANO IO Shield Expansion Board For Arduino Screw Terminals is a small simple Arduino Nano extension board, it will be the Nano all pins of derivation, convenient connection and we do the experiments.

title: Multifunction Shield For Arduino Uno / Leonardo
description: This Arduino Uno and Leonardo compatible multifunction experimenter shield (HCARDU0085) has a large range of features which makes it ideal for beginners who just want to experiment and learn, or just as a general-purpose shield for more advanced uses.

title: Pro-Range BLD750 Brushless DC Motor Driver
description: The Pro-Range BLD750 BLDC motor drive is a high-performance, cost-effective 3-phase BLDC motor drive, which can provide a power output of Max 750VA. The design is based on advanced DSP technology and features high torque, low noise, low vibration, PID speed loop, PID current loop, over-current protection, overload protection, and a combined use of manual speed adjustment and automatic speed adjustment.

title: VisionFive2 RISC-V Single Board Computer 8GB WiFi
description: The Waveshare VisionFive2 RISC-V Single Board Computer is a cutting-edge computing solution built around the StarFive JH7110 processor, which features an integrated 3D GPU. This single-board computer offers powerful computing capabilities suitable for a wide range of applications, from embedded systems to IoT devices. With its RISC-V architecture, the VisionFive2 delivers efficient and scalable performance, making it ideal for both industrial and educational purposes.
